properties.entry: insert into studentfeestaging ( File_No, Academic_Year, Semester, FeeHead_Id, Amount, Created_By, Updated_By, Approved, Fee_Generated, Created_Date, Modified_Date ) select sd.File_No ,sd.Academic_Year,sd.Semester,:FeeHead_Id,:Amount, :Created_By, :Created_By ,null,null, now(), now() from studentdetail sd where sd.File_No=:File_No;
Delete from studentfeestaging where File_No=:File_No and FeeHead_Id=:FeeHead_Id;
SELECT COURSE, BRANCH, SEMESTER, FEE_HEAD_ID, FEE_AMOUNT FROM feedetailmaster where COURSE=:COURSE AND BRANCH=:BRANCH;

Insert into feedetailmaster
(COURSE, BRANCH, SEMESTER, FEE_HEAD_ID, FEE_AMOUNT) values
(:COURSE, :BRANCH, :SEMESTER, :FEE_HEAD_ID, :FEE_AMOUNT)
Delete from feedetailmaster where COURSE=:COURSE AND BRANCH=:BRANCH AND SEMESTER=:SEMESTER ;

Insert into feetransactionDebit
(File_No, Semester, Component_Id, User, Created_Date, Remark, Mode) values
( :File_No, :Semester, :Component_Id, :User, now(), :Remark, :Mode )

Insert into feetransactionCredit
(File_No, Semester, Component_Id, User, Created_Date, Remark, Mode) values
( :File_No, :Semester, :Component_Id, :User, now(), :Remark, :Mode )
